name: Lights out- MegaMan escape.
description: The game is simple, there is not anyone in the house who pays attention to the ghost when it is not around, so it went after the real royal prize, megaman, play as the ghost trying to capture and kill megaman final boss style, before he escapes. I think it is scary I would be way more inclined to run if I saw megaman run past me, than a scared human being.
